definition: characterized by a government in which the political authority exercises absolute and centralized control, an adherent of totalitarian principles or totalitarian government
details:
adjective
- characterized by a government in which the political authority exercises absolute and centralized control
= example: characterized by a government in which the political authority exercises absolute and centralized control
- of or relating to the principles of totalitarianism according to which the state regulates every realm of life
= example: of or relating to the principles of totalitarianism according to which the state regulates every realm of life
= synonyms: totalistic
noun
- an adherent of totalitarian principles or totalitarian government
